DOC.brief_summary: This single- multiple-ascending dose study first evaluation PF-04965842 , Janus kinase1 ( JAK1 ) inhibitor , human . The goal ass safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics healthy Western Japanese subject .
DOC.brief_title: First-in-Human Study Evaluate Safety Tolerability Single Multiple Ascending Doses Janus Kinase-1 Inhibitor PF-04965842 Healthy Western Japanese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive . Females must nonchild bear potential either least 1 year post menopausal ( FSH â‰¥40 IU/L ) , document hysterectomy ( without bilateral oophrectomy ) least 6 month prior study day Subjects willing defer receive prophylactic immunization ( e.g . influenza pneumococcal vaccine ) study . Absolute lymphocyte count must great equal low limit laboratory reference range . Subjects enrol Cohort 8 must four Japanese grandparent born Japan . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . History hepatitis positive test human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , hepatitis B core antibody ( HBc Ab ) hepatitis C antibody ( HCV ) . Clinically significant abnormality chest Xray perform screen within 3 month screen date ; history tuberculosis active latent inadequately treated infection .
